PageTitle: source-lifetime (VPN instance PIM view/PIM view of a public network instance)
FuncDef:
The source-lifetime command specifies a timeout period for (S, G) entries.
The undo source-lifetime command restores the default value. The source-lifetime command specifies a timeout period for (S, G) entries. The undo source-lifetime command restores the default value. By default, the timeout period of (S, G) entries is 210 seconds.
ParentView: VPN instance PIM view,PIM view of a public network instance

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a timeout period for (S, G) entries.
The value is an integer ranging from 60 to 65535, in seconds.

ExtraInfo: A Router creates a timer for each (S, G) entry. To set a timeout period for those timers, run the source-lifetime command. The Router starts the timer after receiving multicast packets from a multicast source for the first time. Each time the Router receives a multicast packet from the source, the Router resets the timer. If no multicast packets are received before timer times out, the (S, G) entry is considered invalid.
